message: Starting integration test analysis - examining current parameter flows and synchronization architecture
Analyzed codebase architecture and existing test patterns. Designing comprehensive integration test suite for parameter synchronization

Created comprehensive integration test suite with 4 test files covering current state, synchronization gaps, cross-component integration, and transaction integrity. Now creating documentation and pytest configuration.

INTEGRATION TEST SUITE COMPLETE: Created comprehensive 4-tier integration test framework covering current state validation, synchronization gaps, cross-component integration, and transaction integrity. Ready for validation of implemented parameter synchronization across all PLC operations.
